color_palette.accessibility_notes: Sufficient contrast ratios (WCAG AA) ensured. Harmonious and non-straining tones.

typography.accessibility_notes: Minimum body text size 16px, adjustable sizing preferred. Line height ~1.5.

logo.concept: Stylized, abstract loop/cycle with subtle natural elements (e.g., fluid curves, gradients).
logo.visual_description: Circular or lemniscate shape formed by two intertwined, soft-edged curves in Cyan-Light and Cyan-Medium.

components.name: Stage Monitor
components.description: Displays current stage and its status (Pending, Executing, Completed, Error).

components.name: Details/Logs Area
components.description: Collapsible section for input/output details and logs.

ui_layout.aesthetic_notes: Soft borders, generous whitespace, rounded corners, light backgrounds, subtle animations mimicking natural movements.
ui_layout.accessibility_notes: Clear hierarchy, keyboard navigation support, ARIA labels for dynamic elements, multiple cues for status (color, icon, text).

steps: Initial state: Interface shows 'Ready to Start'.
Button provides visual feedback. Controls update (Start disabled, Pause/Reset enabled).
Loop Progress Visualization updates and animates.
Stage Monitor highlights current stage (e.g., 'La Metta') with 'Executing' status.
Details/Logs area may auto-expand or show initial inputs.
